sentence: Fuentes, a white nationalist who celebrated the attack in its aftermath, notably hosted Rep. Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.) as a keynote speaker at a conference last year, just weeks after the attack.
title: Jan. 6 investigators subpoena far-right figures who promoted election fraud claims

sentence: Last November, the House voted to censure Rep. Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.) after he released an amine video on social media that showed him attacking President Biden and Ocasio-Cortez.
author: The Hill via Nexstar Media Wire
title: AOC claps back after Tucker Carlson calls her ‘entitled white lady’

sentence: Republican House leader Kevin McCarthy has been called “toothless” for inadequately dealing with Reps Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar after their appearance at a white nationalist event.
author: Gino Spocchia
title: ‘Toothless’ McCarthy vows to ‘talk to’ Marjorie Taylor Greene over her appearance at white nationalist event
